name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the evening of July 22, fans of the star Gong Jun shouted in unison "Down with the dog traitor" in front of the Hunan Radio and Television Station

It is said that the incident was caused by a conflict between Gong Jun's "only fans" (those who only like Gong Jun) and "CP fans" (those who like Gong Jun and Zhang Zhehan). Because Zhang Zhehan was previously deeply involved in the Yasukuni Shrine incident, the "only fans" shouted the slogan "Down with the dog traitor".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@Z_ZoeyMeow China is a huge fan club
If you understand the fan club, you actually understand China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
At around 9 am on July 23, Xi'an Xincheng Square was under full martial law, and pedestrians were not allowed to pass. The square was surrounded by police and special police.

Xincheng Square is the square in front of the Shaanxi Provincial Government. Its status in Xi'an is equivalent to Tiananmen Square. There is a flag-raising ceremony around 6 am every day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, a large number of security personnel have been deployed near the Big Wild Goose Pagoda in Xi'an. The small square where the Xuanzang statue is located has been surrounded.

content:
Information correction
Some netizens pointed out that this picture is a photo of Xi'an Hi-Tech Phase III parents kneeling down to petition for admission to No. 31 Middle School, not a photo of Xi'an parents protesting on July 21
The situation on the Internet is untrue, and we hereby correct and apologize.

Netizen contribution
In Xi'an, the police station came to the door and asked the parents to open the door, but they refused
Then the community called and threatened the parents to cooperate with the police station to open the door. The parents refused and said that if they broke into the house, they would call other parents to go to Fuping, "Don't force me, I am an orphan and a widow, I can risk my life for my children to go to school."
Finally, he said that four or five people are now stalking at his door
